About us

Fast transportation and logistics solutions

SLOC is a leading company in the transportation sector, with over 5 years of experience in the market. We offer a wide range of land, sea, and air transportation solutions to meet our clients' needs.

Global coverage

We have an extensive network of partners worldwide that allows us to offer you a hassle-free door-to-door transportation service.

Delivery time

No matter where you need to send your products, SLOC can help you get there.

Some facts

Number one place to manage all your shipments.

At SLOC, we not only focus on connecting the world through transportation but also strive to be an innovative and industry-leading company. Here are some interesting facts you might not know about us:

Our Services

Explore Our Services

Air Transportation

Our fastest mode of transportation, ideal for transferring goods over long distances.

Maritime cargo

We offer maritime transportation characterized by its capacity, low cost, higher cargo capacity, and flexibility of goods.

Road Transportation

This mode allows reaching remote locations and the ability to adapt to different transportation needs.

Inventory Management

We operate a distribution system where logistic units are received at a staging platform and not stored but prepared for immediate shipment.

Customs Clearance

We have a protocol for the entry and exit of goods during a trade operation.

Storage Solutions

We have systems and technologies that help us store and organize goods, products, or materials.
